summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the reassessment and reassessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1025, for the improvement of Hanford Street, from Utah Street to 1st Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues all in the City of Seattle, by constructing a plank roadway 24 feet in width, as provided by Ordinance No. 11949, under Ordinance No. 32907 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
